YOUR TEACHER | ANDRE MADARANG
Greetings! I'm Andre, a full-stack web developer and Laracasts instructor. My other hobbies include playing guitar, videography and gaming.
ABOUT THIS EPISODE
Publish on Jan 6th, 2021
Laravel Jetstream is beautifully designed application scaffolding too that provides a great starting point your new applications. It's built with Tailwind CSS, Alpinejs and Blade Components and includes features like login, registration, profile management, two-factor auth, session management, API tokens, and teams.
